thread.title: Channel Islands 'outstanding' for young talent
thread.title_full: Channel Islands 'outstanding' for young talent | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Channel Islands 'outstanding' for young talent
text:
The local competition sees young people perform in front of judges Producers of one of the UK's biggest TV talent shows were 'overwhelmed' with the abilities of the Channel Islands' young people, according to organisers of a local event.
The annual Jersey's Kids Got Talent competition is under way today, with the winner expected to be announced this evening.
Britain's Got Talent producers have also been watching the acts, and the organisers of the competition say the team were impressed with the standards they saw.
They were overwhelmed with the talent. Their view was that [..] Jersey and Guernsey have more talent than the South West of England. And I think at least half a dozen people will go through to Britain's Got Talent to the live shows. They were really so impressed.
â€“ Mary Beghin, Organiser Last updated Sat 3 Oct Guernsey
